review.comment: I wouldn’t recommend this place I thought it would be a good place to go to get the help I needed they told me I needed to be off methadone for a week so I waited till I was off for 8-9 days but was still using during that time when I went in I still tested positive for methadone following day they tried to give me subutex and was put into precipitated withdrawals and was not really offered any help so I left also was strip searched by two females and I am a male so that is illegal from what I have read and will be seeking legal advise.
review.review_reply: Hi Cameron - we're sorry to hear about your experience, we would like to speak with you to gather more information about the situation and learn how we can improve our services. Please call 480-923-6301, thank you.

review.comment: Kind, caring, PATIENT, staff.  Especially the Behavioral Health Technicians. They deserve the world and a raise for what they had to put up with when I was at my lowest. What they do for work is very special. I would recommend Buena Vista for anyone needing detox. This place rescued me time and time again. I can honestly say that without Buena Vista I would not be alive today. I mean this from the bottom of my heart. I thank you, my family thanks you.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the amazing review, Taylor! We are happy that we were able to help you recover. Just continue living a happy and sober life. Take care!

review.comment: I had a fantastic experience with Buena Vista Phoenix. I felt that I am very well taken care of. Those dark days are over with their help. The staff are very accommodating and helpful. Everything's great!
review.review_reply: Good to hear from you, Greg! Thank you for the positive feedback. We take pride on our staff giving the highest quality of care to help you recover.

review.comment: I told them my shower is not good, so please I want to switch my room but the supervisor didn’t accept what I need, her name Didi , so I told her I want to go home she said ok go home , but thy was have many empty rooms, and I leaved with not complete my recovery.
review.review_reply: I am truly saddened to hear this, Ibrahim. Don't worry for I will take care of this matter. Someone will also reach out to you. We at Buena Vista Drug & Alcohol Recovery Center of Phoenix takes pride in providing the best service to our patients.

review.comment: Save your time and energy. I was shocked, nurses can treat  people the way I was treated.?had to beg for compassion. Beg!!! I believe this is a one stop,  drug fix for chronic users.
review.review_reply: Hi Christa, we are sorry to hear that your experience with us didn't meet your expectations. Please contact us and we can do our best to improve together.

review.comment: Amazing staff and facility. Would definitely recommend to anyone who is looking to help. Very comfortable with your own giant room and bathroom. Food could use some work but other than that everything was great!!!
review.review_reply: What a heartwarming feedback, Jakob! We are glad you enjoyed the facility. We are more inspired to continue providing the best service for those who are in recovery.

review.comment: Incredible place!! I am so happy to work for this company. We will go above and beyond to help those who are suffering!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your 5-star review, Taylor. Let's continue to work hard to provide a great experience.

review.comment: I went to this facility and was a bit scared at first. Just because it’s a new environment your gonna be in & don’t know what to expect. From the minute I got there it was nothing but friendly people and staff that work there. The BHT’s are among the best in the business and treat you like family. I would really recommend this place to anyone with an addiction problem. Thanks to all the staff for taking such great care of me while I was there and really wish there was something I could do for them as a thank you for all you did for me!! Much love to all the BV staff!!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your lovely review, Moe. It's so great to know that you enjoyed your experience with us and we'll be sure to pass your kind words onto the team. Thanks again!

review.comment: Great program with staff who truly about what they do!
review.review_reply: Hi, Jason! Thank you for your review. Getting positive feedback from the people we serve is always a joy. Have a great day!
Thank you for your kind review, Lalala Lalala. We are beyond happy to help as many people as possible. Please feel free to contact us to know more about your experience and how we can help you.

review.comment: This place has helped my family member get their life back, I'm extremely grateful for all the help they have provided. This facility is beautiful looking inside and out with nice private bedrooms, and my family member mentioned the food was very good too! Definitely recommend this facility to help someone recover from addiction. They know what they're doing.
review.review_reply: Thanks so much for your positive feedback and good vibes. Katherine. It's our mission to help. We wish you all the best.
Hi Wood! Thank you so much for leaving a five-star review. Take care and please keep in touch with us. ❤

review.comment: I am reading some of these reviews usually don't leave reviews but I am angry my daughter was in one of their programs last year and they did nothing but keep us from her keep her from us and now we're lucky if we see her every couple months still using after leaving the facility she went to a another facility or home and has never come back left that facility and just checks in once in awhile I'm Amazed that this facility can call them self experts and Recovery
review.review_reply:
Hi E cl,

We're sorry to hear about this. Please feel free to contact us and so we can learn more about your daughters experience and how we can help.

review.comment: Recently left .....horrible experience.    They keep you from family.  I understand detox but come on.  Lost my girl.    Cheated on her inside. No supervision.    Putting someone in a place like this won't do anything but make it worse finally found a safe place.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review. However, as per checking, we don't have a record of you ever visiting us or one of our clients. Please give us a call at (480) 680-0606 and we'll try to deal with it in the best way possible.

review.comment: Horrible place  don't take your loved ones.   Detox ok but iffy.     Billing Horrible and husband got a new girlfriend.  Staff don't communicate and no proper supervision therefore im divorcing the cheat.    Stay away.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review, we've recently checked our records and we couldn't find a record of you ever visiting us or one of our clients. Please give us a call at (480) 680-0606 and we'll try to deal with it in the best way possible.

review.comment: I'm experiencing a horrible situation with this place there's more adult fun going on than recovery....don't send your loved one here staff are kids and you'll for sure lose your relationship because there are new ones in buena vista chandler....stay away
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review, we've recently checked our records and we couldn't find a record of you ever visiting us or one of our clients. Please give us a call at (480) 680-0606 and we'll try to deal with it in the best way possible.

review.comment: Your Receptionist Keiana has a wonderful voice and a great personality.  She is a great asset to your Help Center
review.review_reply: Thank you for leaving a positive review, Mary!

Thank you for the review. However, as per checking, we don't have a record of you ever visiting us or one of our clients. Please give us a call at (480) 680-0606 and we'll try to deal with it in the best way possible.

review.comment: A lot of neglect from day time nurses. Good luck finding them. Night staff much better. Unusable bathroom facilities.. Shower Water drains onto the floor stained shower curtains that are never cleaned. This is a bare minimum care facility and is overcrowded by regulars. You will get better care elsewhere.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review, Jon. We'd like to know more about your experience with us, however, we couldn't a record of you ever visiting us or one of our clients. Please give us a call at (480) 680-0606 and we'll try to deal with it in the best way possible.

review.comment: Was approved by my insurance and 15 mins before intake my gf was called by facility saying STAFF was giving push back assuming I was in there about a month ago.. was order by probation notified them of what was done as well as my insurance complaints are being filled with appropriate places. Funny thing is imagine a addict who uses again after leaving treatment I hope I wasn't the first one to ever do that

review.review_reply: Thank you so much for all those beautiful stars, Ronda! We work hard to provide a great experience, so it is always great to receive such positive feedback.

review.comment: Best place to detox ,  they treat you soo good and actually genuinely care for you and are super chill and relaxed they want you to feel comfortable as much as possible they have a two rooms for watching tv and movies and have recliner chairs so your all nice and relaxed, the food is amazing and all day they have snack and they have smoke break literally every 45 mins or when ever you need it . They really do care about you .make sure  you bring a lot of cigs hah might smoke like crazy but also ! They have there own cigs that can give you as well as many as you want . But if you are picky on cigs bring your own I do lol and also you can bring your own cloths and be comfortable. You also get your own room as well alos shower and bathroom all in there .get you’re Ahcccs and come here , I’m thankful for this place don’t pass up on this place
review.review_reply: We really appreciate the time you took to write review of our service. Thank you also for your efforts that contributes positive changes in your life. More blessings to come Juice Z!

review.comment: I was really hoping that my boyfriend would get the help he needed when I dropped him off numerous times for detox, inpatient care and intensive outpatient care at Buena Vista. Instead, he came out more screwed up than ever, and with a side chick, enabler addict named Randi, and a prescription drug dealer named Ron. This isn’t an angry rant from a disgruntled partner. I am legit warning people about trusting that their loved ones will actually get the help they need from this establishment. It’s filled with people who don’t actually want to get better, or be any kind of real support for others in the program. It’s pretty much a meetup for addicts to connect and relapse together. This is not a safe place for those who want to take it seriously.
Great Staff, Great experience! I would recommend to anyone who is seeking treatment and ready for the next step in their journey
review.review_reply: Thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts and feedback with us. We're grateful for your honest feedback and we're glad you feel we're on the right track!
Thank you so much for your positive feedback and for taking the time to post this review.

review.comment: Buena Vista Recovery Center is terrific!  It's beautiful, clean and affordable with a fantastic program under the direction of good-natured staff.  Definitely one of Arizona's finest.  Highly recommended!! - 5 Stars.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the wonderful review and for taking the time to share your feedback with Buena Vista. Our priority is customer service and we are ecstatic that we met that mark! Kind folks like you make our job a pleasure.

review.comment: Fantastic program with an awesome staff!  I highly recommend Buena Vista for those who are struggling.  Truly a pace that is safe and moreover the staff is beyond impressive.  These folks are amazing!
review.review_reply: Thanks so much for your positive feedback and good vibes. You've always taken the time to share your experience with the community.

review.comment: Program and building were nice, but the billing practices are very sketchy at best.  I would NOT recommend this place to anyone.  They've billed my insurance company multiple times trying to work out there daily fee.  They kept submitting until they got it right.  Over 30,000 submitted so they could finally get me a bill for what I supposedly owe after post insurance write-offs and this is after the required substantial deposit.  They took over 5 months to get me a correct bill and now threaten collections.  I would of paid if the bills wouldn't of varied so greatly month to month.  The person I was working with couldn't explain why, but kept say they were working with insurance.  I would NOT recommend on these grounds alone.
Very poor structure
review.review_reply: Hi Angie, we are sorry your experience with us didn't meet expectations. Please feel free to contact us and we can do our best to improve together.
Hi Dustin, we are sorry your experience with us didn't meet expectations. Please feel free to contact us and we can do our best to improve together.
Hi Anthony, we are sorry your experience with us didn't meet expectations. Please feel free to contact us and we can do our best to improve together.

review.comment: I was extremely happy with the choice I made in Buena Vista.  Completely professional and helpful throughout my stay.  Thank you!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind review. We are beyond happy to help as many people as possible and we are so happy to have worked with you!

review.comment: I’ve had the chance to get to know the clinical team here and they are a great group with extensive experience in addiction treatment and recovery.  It is great to see how committed they are to helping others.  The facility itself is outstanding.  Everything from private rooms and private bathrooms to very comfortable community areas, will make patients feel comfortable and safe.   Outstanding.
review.review_reply: Thank you Rich for the positive review! We are very excited to be apart of this community and appreciate your support.

review.comment: Awesome staff!
review.review_reply: Thanks for your positive review J!

review.comment: Very excited to see Buena Vista expanding their reach and opening more facilities. I've been very impressed with Buena Vista and have watched them impact countless lives!
review.review_reply: Thanks for the positive review Keegan.
